name: The curious house in the park
name_original: The curious house in the park
description:
A strange house has been built in the park, something terrible or close to it happens inside it, the kids are scared to death and think about entering the house, except you, Timmy with your friends Amy and Ty who forced you to go in the house, enter the house. see what's inside and survive to tell it with help from your friends. 

(Note: The game may have some bugs, but it doesn't compromise making the game unplayable, The game has 4 endings and holding large objects makes you not able to open doors, windows and turn on lights).

W/A/S/D - Move 

Q  or left mouse "Depends on config.(Commands)" - Run

E or space "Depends on config.(Commands)" - Interact 

R or right mouse "Depends on config.(Commands)" - Crouch 

I - Objectives "When I had it inside the house" 

C - Setup/Pause "When it appears" 

T - Ungrasp "When he catches you" 

Scroll mouse - Scour the fridge

Scroll mouse press - Drop item on floor
